name: Bodoink - Kinect Family Fun
blurb: Drop in (literally!) for some amazing Kinect fun where you are the pinball! The first Kickstarter console game!

rewards.reward: SPECTATOR\r\nReceive an exclusive Bodoink sticker. Every little bit helps!
CONTESTANT\r\nPreorder Bodoink! Get the game from Xbox LIVE when it\u2019s released.
COMPETITOR \r\nReceive a copy of Bodoink and get to vote on the features and content that go into Bodoink!
BIG FAN\r\nReceive a preorder of the game, get to vote, and an awesome T-shirt!

FINALIST\r\nBetter than naming a star after someone, give the gift of having your name (or a anyone else) in the "Special Thanks" portion of the credits. A special certificate will be sent out ahead of time for gift giving.  Plus all of the previous rewards (game, T-shirt, vote).
CHAMPION \r\nReceive a poster signed by the team and all of the previous rewards. If given as a gift, you will be given a special certificate to give to your special someone for the holidays.
TEAM PLAYER\r\nTeamed signed copy of Tony Hawk Shred and all the previous rewards. If given as a gift, you will be given a special certificate to give to your special someone for the holidays.

DESIGN CONSULTANT\r\nGive the ultimate gamers gift (to yourself or others) of being in a real console game! Work with the Design Team to get your likeness integrated into the Game (no inappropriate pictures) and receive a Design Consultant credit and all CHAMPION level rewards. If given as a gift, you will be given a special certificate to give to your special someone for the holidays.

LOCALS ONLY Only for Chicagoans (or you take care of travel and lodging), spend two days at Robomodo to see how the game is put together. Get Design Consultant credit, get your face in the game and have Robomodo's President, Josh Tsui make you a great gourmet steak dinner at the studio using molecular gastronomy techniques! This also includes all CHAMPION level rewards. This prize is subject to scheduling.  If given as a gift, you will be given a special certificate to give to your special someone for the holidays.

ASSISTANT DESIGNER\r\nName a Microsoft Achievement (pending approval, no inappropriate names) and get your likeness (or a worthy friend) into the game.  Have a video conference call with the team, receive an Assistant Designer credit and all CHAMPION level rewards. As above, if you choose to send this as a gift to someone, we will put together a special certificate for giving during the holidays.

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER 
Fund Bodoink and be credited as an Executive Producer! You get everything from TEAM PLAYER and your likeness in the game. But wait, that's not all! You also receive a bundle of signed games, plus a Studio Tour and lunch with the key players at Robomodo.  Get yourself on video for the tour and you’ll be seen in the marketing packages as well as in the end credits. All this and all CHAMPION level rewards.Responsible for own travel and lodging in Chicago.

If given as a gift, you will be given a special certificate to give to your special someone for the holidays.
